document.full_text: johnson & johnson will buy swiss medical devices maker synthes inc for $21.67 billion, placing a big bet on growing its orthopedics business with one of the largest deals ever in the medical technology sector.
document.title: j&j to buy device maker synthes for over $21 billion
lines_and_colors: johnson & johnson will buy swiss medical devices maker synthes inc for $21.67 billion, placing a big bet on growing its orthopedics business with one of the largest deals ever in the medical technology sector.
